xml_element.name: ultimos
xml_element.title: Ultimos - Operating Periods for Particular Days of the Month - Counted from the End of the Month
xml_element.author: $Author: jz $

description.p: Sets the day of the month.
Sets the operating period for a particular day of the month - counted from the end of the month.

example.pre: <montdays> <day day="0"> <period begin="10:00" end="12:00"/> </day> <day day="1"> <period begin="08:00" end="12:00"/> <period begin="15:00" end="18:00"/> </day> </day>
example.p: Defines the operating periods as being the last day of the month, from 10:00 to 12:00 and the second last day of the month from 08:00 to 12:00 and 15:00 to 18:00.
